name: the Line
description: The Line is a rogue-like / dungeon crawler with a turn-based combat system. The main object is to stand out the long line for resettlement from the oppressive east segment of the city.
minimum_requirements: OS: x86 / x64 7,8,10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2000 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 610 / Intel (R) HD Graphics 5300 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2000 MB available space
